reviews.text: First time i have been here and i loved it. They beach is beautiful so clean. Plenty of lifeguards there as well. I cant wait to go back and explore some more. Travelled from Cardiff by bus and was a pleasant journey. A frequent train goes right in by the front to.

A great day out for the family. 

New council fees for parking are not cheap so be aware. 

Lots to do, seaside, arcades and ice cream! 

The fun fair has been revamped and looks like fun.
Easy to find station but the coverage for the weather could've been better. The signs are a bit strange too for first-timers.
Brilliant walk lovely beach kids love it and us

We had an uplifting refreshing day in and around Barry in the vale of Glamorgan always a warm welcome at the island coffi shop big bright sky and managed to find time to get to lovely cold knap such a lovely feel over there the beach is amazing on  a hot day with wonderful panoramic views, lovely lovely lovely !!
